name: War of 1812 battle of queenston heights
name_original: War of 1812 battle of queenston heights
description:
The history

In the year 1812 the young country of U.S declares war on the British colony that will become Canada. In the battle of Queenston heights on the Niagara escarpment 80 Haudenosaunee and Delaware warriors successfully held back over 1000 Americans for hours until British reinforcements came.

instruction:

Arrow keys to move and space to shoot

rules:

1 dont die (makes sense) and 2 if 3 Americans make it

to the end of the screen its also game over.
